mapper.select:
select t.sn_imei from vivo_plant_electronicsn t where t.sn_imei in
#{item}
select t.product_id as name ,count(t.*) as qty from vivo_plant_electronicsn t where t.product_id is not null and t.retailDate > =#{dateStart} and t.retailDate <=#{dateEnd} group by t.product_id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO vivo_plant_electronicsn ( sn_imei, company_id, product_id, retail_date, create_time ) VALUES
( #{item.snImei}, #{item.companyId}, #{item.productId}, #{item.retailDate}, #{item.createTime} )
